about.title: About me
about.name: Jorge Ortega
about.text: a programmer with over 3 years of experience, including roles as a developer in companies and as a web services seller.
about.secondaryText: Welcome to my portfolio! Discover the projects I've developed and learn more about my professional journey.

projects.title: Works
projects.subtitle: Custom made for my clients
projects.description: These projects were completely made by me, under contract with clients who requested my services
projects.mobileFocus: Please note that due to the tight budget, I prioritized the MOBILE aspect, to make it as user-friendly as possible, since more than 80% of the traffic on these pages comes from mobile users

jobs.title: Featured Works
jobs.description: Below, you'll find a selection of the most outstanding works I've participated in. Each project reflects my commitment to quality and innovation in software development. Specially adapted for mobile interfaces, ensuring a smooth and attractive user experience.

services: SQL and NoSQL database design and creation
Different language connection through REST APIs
Optimization and maintenance of existing applications

personalProjects.title: Personal Projects
personalProjects.subtitle: Learn a little more about me with these
personalProjects.description: Developed when I was approximately 16-18 years old, they helped me forge the logic that should be behind each solution, they are projects that I developed while I was in high school conditions

contact.title: Let's Talk
contact.subtitle: Here are different ways to contact me:

message.label: Message
message.placeholder: Hello, I would like to know more information.

success.title: Message sent successfully
success.description: You will receive a response as soon as possible

cards.title: My knowledge
cards.subtitle: The projects I've worked on cover these three necessary areas to develop custom pages.

frontend.title: Frontend
frontend.description: Able to develop readable interfaces adaptable to any page context

backend.title: Backend
backend.description: Create scalable infrastructures following clean code best practices

services.title: Services/Platforms
services.description: Able to handle platforms for service and API integration in an optimal way

trabajos.title: Licoreria Spondylus
trabajos.update: Update: MONGO REALM was discontinued, also the liquor store closed its doors and with it the project was abandoned because it is not viable to migrate from BaaS
trabajos.description: Web application that allows the purchase of beverages. This project consisted of adapting a physical store to an online store, managing all corresponding parameters such as inventory, prices, discounts, among others. It also includes the integration of an API with a messaging service for beverage delivery.

trabajos.title: Jandrea
trabajos.sub: Ecommerce for selling services like Laser Cutting, 3D Printing and other customizable objects
trabajos.description: Web app focused on an interactive catalog. I still continue providing certain visual improvements and interface optimization. Along with the page, I also carried out social media marketing to boost online sales

proyects.title: Jet Match
proyects.about: Record your routines and bank loans in a visual and motivating way. With this application, you can paint a picture for each interaction you make, thus seeing your progress and achievements tangibly.

proyects.title: My Money
proyects.about: A digital wallet that allows managing the user's personal expenses over a certain time. It stores all user transactions in history through fixed and variable costs and expenses that allow data science with the obtained information.

proyects.title: CountDowns
proyects.about: Website that allows creating countdowns, whether to remember an important date or to keep track of how many days are left until a specific date happens. It has predefined countdowns. Such as astronomical events, holidays and world events.

proyects.title: Files Manager
proyects.about: Simple application created from Batch Scripting (Windows) that managed documents (.docx, .pdf) in folders named after school subjects. At the beginning of the pandemic I developed this as a method to make the new online mode at school easier.

footer.whatsappMessage: Hello, I come from your portfolio...
